page.title: 02A day in the life of Peter
page.content: I am 10 years old and this is my usual day{during school term_time. In the morning I get up at 7.00am and get dressed and at 7.15 I have my breakfast _ Rice Crispies. At 7.30 I watch TV until 8.30 when I go to school.{I play football}until 9.00am when school starts. I stay at school until 3.30pm and then I go home and get changed and go out to play with my friends. At tea_time I usually have chips,egg and sausages and then{I go out to play on {my bike. At 7.55 I have sausages for my supper and then{I watch television until I go to bed at 9.45pm.
